item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Research lab manager & technician (Full-time) | Ryerson University | Sept. 2016 – Present. Science of Music, Auditory Research, and Technology (SMART) Lab      Additional roles:         Assistant Manuscript Coordinator of AIRS Volume I | May 2019 – March 2020         Project manager of SingWell Canada | May 2018 – Present Research assistant (Part-time) | McMaster University | May 2016 – Apr. 2017. Music, Acoustics, Perception and LEarning (MAPLE) Lab
